entry.title: Pansies and Butterflies Childrens Tin Teaset FREE tea! Little Girls 15pc Tea Set in a Purple Wicker Style Basket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Delton
Type: Girls Childrens Tea Cups Sets
Price: 39.99

Child size Pansies and Butterflies 15 piece lovely children's tin tea set has a beautiful purple pansies and pretty little butterfly pattern perfect for little girls of all ages!  Each kids teaset has a set of 4 teacups, 4 saucers, 4 plates plus the picnic style wicker basket and tray. FREE tea included with all children tea sets! 

All of our tea ware is FDA tested and deemed Food Safe.
